languages.text: Велел{mf||а} дворянам прекратить пришивать лица на Тассере.
Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.
languages.original_text: Велел{mf||а} дворянам прекратить пришивать лица на Тассере.

traits.locale_text: Ordered that the Thasserian nobility abolish their custom of sewing others' faces on themselves.
Ordered that the Thasserian nobility abolish their custom of sewing others' faces on themselves.
Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.
Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.
Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.
Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

languages.text: タッセーラの貴族たちに、他人の顔の皮を自分の顔に縫いつけるという風習を廃止するよう命じた。
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: タッセーラの貴族たちに、他人の顔の皮を自分の顔に縫いつけるという風習を廃止するよう命じた。

languages.text: Du hast dem thasserianischen Adel befohlen, seine Tradition zu beenden, sich die Gesichter anderer Leute auf das eigene zu nähen.
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Du hast dem thasserianischen Adel befohlen, seine Tradition zu beenden, sich die Gesichter anderer Leute auf das eigene zu nähen.

languages.text: Vous avez ordonné aux nobles thasseriens d'abolir leur coutume consistant à coudre le visage de quelqu'un d'autre sur le leur.
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez ordonné aux nobles thasseriens d'abolir leur coutume consistant à coudre le visage de quelqu'un d'autre sur le leur.

languages.text: Ordenaste a la nobleza thasseriana que aboliesen la práctica de coserse rostros de otras personas a los suyos.
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Ordenaste a la nobleza thasseriana que aboliesen la práctica de coserse rostros de otras personas a los suyos.

languages.text: 你命令塔瑟拉的贵族即刻废除将别人的脸缝到自己脸上的习俗。
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: 你命令塔瑟拉的贵族即刻废除将别人的脸缝到自己脸上的习俗。

languages.text: Thassera soylularına, başkalarının yüzlerine kendi yüzlerine dikme geleneğini sonlandırmalarını emrettin.
languages.original_text: Ordered the Thasserian nobility to abolish their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Thassera soylularına, başkalarının yüzlerine kendi yüzlerine dikme geleneğini sonlandırmalarını emrettin.
